desc: Hello! Flex 4 progresses through 26 self-contained examples selected so you can progressively master Flex. They vary from small one-page apps, to a 3D rotating haiku, to a Connect Four-like game. And in the last chapter you'll learn to build a full Flex application called SocialStalkr   a mashup that lets you follow your friends by showing their tweets on a Yahoo map.
title: Hello! Flex 4
